org.ektorp.http.StdHttpClient.Builder

    Package Description
    org.ektorp.http  

    • Uses of StdHttpClient.Builder in org.ektorp.http

      Methods in org.ektorp.http that return StdHttpClient.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.caching(boolean b)
      Controls if the http client should cache response entities.
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.cleanupIdleConnections(boolean b)
      If set to true, a monitor thread will be started that cleans up idle connections every 30 seconds.
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.compression(boolean b)
      Controls if the http client should send Accept-Encoding: gzip,deflate header and handle Content-Encoding responses.
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.connectionManager(org.apache.http.conn.ClientConnectionManager cm)
      Bring your own Connection Manager.
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.connectionTimeout(int i) 
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.enableSSL(boolean b)
      Set to true in order to enable SSL sockets.
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.host(String s) 
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.maxCacheEntries(int m) 
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.maxConnections(int i) 
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.maxObjectSizeBytes(int m) 
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.password(String s) 
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.port(int i) 
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.proxy(String s) 
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.proxyPort(int p) 
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.relaxedSSLSettings(boolean b)
      If set to true all SSL certificates and hosts will be trusted.
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.socketTimeout(int i) 
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.sslSocketFactory(org.apache.http.conn.ssl.SSLSocketFactory f)
      Bring your own SSLSocketFactory.
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.url(String s) 
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.url(URL url)
      Will set host, port and possible enables SSL based on the properties if the supplied URL.
      StdHttpClient.Builder StdHttpClient.Builder.useExpectContinue(boolean b)
      Activates 'Expect: 100-Continue' handshake with CouchDB.
